reviews.comment: Crap, it played a note, I got the correct note yet its tellin me I\'m wrong and the notes jump, huh?

reviews.comment: Best. Free always ever. Up to three not harmonies including heavy dissonance.  A must get always for serious training

reviews.comment: I love this app! This app is great for ear training. I just hope that I can go to the next question automatically without having to press \'Ok\'.\tThank you to developer.
